mapper.select: select distinct sm.* from sys_user su inner join sys_user_role sur on su.user_id = sur.user_id inner join sys_role sr on sur.role_id=sr.role_id inner join sys_role_menu srm on sr.role_id=srm.role_id inner join sys_menu sm on srm.menu_id=sm.menu_id where su.user_id=#{userId} and sm.parent_id=#{menuId}
select menu_id from sys_role_menu where role_id = #{roleId}
